Skimmer and Lid (M)
Passoire et couvercle (H)
Kelle und Deckel (M)
Schiumarola e coperchio (U)
Espumadera y tapa (H)
おタマとお鍋のフタ（男性）
국자와 냄비 뚜껑(남성)
Skimmer and Lid (Men)
鍋杓和鍋蓋（男用）
鍋杓和鍋蓋（男用）
Skimmer and Lid (M)
kDesc

A metal skimmer paired with a pot lid with a large handle for ease of grip. (From Semifinalist Fantasia)\n【Attack: ★; Defence: ☆; Combo: 4; Attribute: Food】\n*Weapon is held in the hands during combat and slung over the back at all other times.[#Legal]

Une passoire en métal assortie à un couvercle de casserole muni d'une grosse poignée pour une bonne prise en main. (Tiré de Semifinalist Fantasia)\n【Attaque : ★; Défense : ☆; Combo : 4; Attribut : Nourriture】\n*L'arme est tenue en main durant les combats et portée dans le dos le reste du temps.[#Legal]

Eine Schöpfkelle aus Metall und ein Topfdeckel mit großem Griff, der sicheren Halt ermöglicht. (Aus Semifinalist Fantasia)\n【Angriff: ★; Abwehr: ☆; Kombo: 4; Attribut: Nahrung】\n*Waffe wird im Kampf in den Händen gehalten und außerhalb des Kampfes auf dem Rücken getragen.[#Legal]

Una schiumarola di metallo abbinata a un coperchio con un manico robusto che offre una comoda presa. (Da Semifinalist Fantasia)\n【Attacco: ★; Difesa: ☆; Combo: 4; Attributo: Cibo】\n*L'arma viene portata in mano durante il combattimento e in spalla quando non è in uso.[#Legal]

Espumadera metálica y tapa de cazuela con asa grande para facilitar la sujeción. De Semifinalist Fantasia.\n【Ataque: ★; Defensa: ☆; Combo: 4; Atributo: Comida】\n*El arma se sostiene en la mano durante el combate y se lleva colgada a la espalda el resto del tiempo.[#Legal]
金属製のおタマと、大きめの取っ手が付いたお鍋のフタのセット。（セミファイナリストファンタジアより）\n【攻撃力：★、防御力：☆、コンボ：4、属性：食】\n※武器は戦闘イベント中は手に装着されます。通常時は背中に装着されます。[#Legal]
금속제인 국자와 커다란 손잡이가 달려있는 냄비 뚜껑 세트(세미파이널리스트 판타지아에서 사용)\n【공격력:★, 방어력:☆, 콤보:4, 속성:식】\n※무기는 전투 이벤트 중에는 손에 장착됩니다. 평상시에는 등에 장착됩니다.[#Legal]

A metal skimmer paired with a pot lid with a large handle for ease of grip. (From Semifinalist Fantasia)\n【Attack: ★; Defence: ☆; Combo: 4; Attribute: Food】\n*Weapon is held in the hands during combat and slung over the back at all other times.[#Legal]
金屬製的鍋杓和大手柄的鍋蓋。（來自Semifinalist Fantasia）\n【攻擊力：★、防御力：☆、連擊：4、屬性：食】\n※武器會於戰鬥時握在手中，平時則會揹在背上。[#Legal]
金屬製的鍋杓和大手柄的鍋蓋。（來自Semifinalist Fantasia）\n【攻擊力：★、防御力：☆、連擊：4、屬性：食】\n※武器會於戰鬥時握在手中，平時則會揹在背上。[#Legal]

A metal skimmer paired with a pot lid with a large handle for ease of grip. (From Semifinalist Fantasia)\n【Attack: ★; Defense: ☆; Combo: 4; Attribute: Food】\n*Weapon is held in the hands during combat and slung over the back at all other times.[#Legal]
